description: Try our easy to follow French Onion & Mushroom Wholemeal Spaghetti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Spring,Sesame free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: French Onion & Mushroom Wholemeal Spaghetti Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs Chris’ traditional French onion dip

recipeInstructions.text: Cook your pasta in heavily salted water as per packet instructions.
While the pasta is cooking, fry your onions & mushrooms in olive oil until the onions are caramelised.
Before you drain your pasta, remove half a cup of the cooking water and reserve.
Drain the pasta and place back in the warm pot.
Stir a quarter of the cooking water back through the pasta, along with the French Onion Dip. Add more water if needed – you’re looking for a creamy consistency.
